CustomField.description: Indicates whether the issue type the project task will be created as in Jira is a standard issue or a sub-task issue type.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether the issue type the project task will be created as in Jira is a standard issue or a sub-task issue type. After selecting a value, you must select a Jira Issue Type.
CustomField.label: Jira Issue Type Category
